definition: variant of 錄像|录像[lu4 xiang4]

sentences.english: We want to buy Knitwear and Knitted Fabrics, Audio and Video Products.
sentences.chinese: 我们要采购针织物，织物，声音和录象机产品。

sentences.english: Great for handling pictures and videos I take on my mobile.
sentences.chinese: 可以很好地处理手机所拍的照片和录象。

sentences.english: Akiba sent a video greeting in the similar spirit.
sentences.chinese: 广岛市长秋叶忠利在录象中也表示了同样的观点。

sentences.english: At first, the basic principles of VTR playback are described.
sentences.chinese: 首先，介绍录象机重放的基本原理。

sentences.english: Practise using the video until you feel quite at home with it.
sentences.chinese: 多用录象机，直到你能熟练使用为止。

sentences.english: Speaking of here , there are three videos.
sentences.chinese: 你可以检查一下这里的录象带。

sentences.english: He did the video for the wellness program last year.
sentences.chinese: 是他去年为运营部做的那个录象。

sentences.english: The only woman among them, Faye Turney, says her videotape confessions were false.
sentences.chinese: 特尼说关于她招供的录象带是伪造的。

sentences.english: Rescaling of video to utilize full-screen area.
sentences.chinese: 录象机的再计数利用全荧屏区域。

sentences.english: Why doesn't the video player work?
sentences.chinese: 为什么录象机不能用呢？

sentences.english: Good, and then where is my videotape ?
sentences.chinese: 很好，那么我的录象带在哪儿？

sentences.english: You can check out the videos here.
sentences.chinese: 你可以检查一下这里的录象带。

sentences.english: Gao Wei and his classmates are watching the video.
sentences.chinese: 高伟和他的同学们正在看录象。

sentences.english: The quality of the reproduced picture meets the requirements in VTR for home use.
sentences.chinese: 其再生图象的质量基本满足家用录象机的要求。

definition: variant of 錄像|录像[lu4 xiang4]
live relay/broadcast of actual scene/to broadcast live
